alert.note: Alert for Manua; Rose Atoll; Swains Island; Tutuila and Aunuu (American Samoa) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS American Samoa (Pago Pago, American Samoa)
info.headline: High Surf Advisory issued April 27 at 9:59PM SST by NWS American Samoa
info.description: ...A High Surf Advisory remains in effect... WHAT...High surf of 10 to 12 feet WHERE...Southern shorelines of all islands WHEN...Through Monday IMPACTS...Minor. Expect some strong breaking waves, shorebreak, and strong longshore and rip currents making water recreation difficult and dangerous. Some coastal erosion is also possible for vulnerable locations. Larger set waves may occasionally impact harbor entrances. && Fautuaga mo galu maualuluga Ofisa o le tau Pago Pago AS 958 PO ASO TOFI APERILA 27 2023 ...O loo faaauau le Fautuaga mo Galu maualuluga... MAFUAAGA...Galu maualuluga e 10 i le 12 futu NOFOAGA...Talafatai uma o Amerika Samoa, ae maise lava talafatai i saute TAIMI...Se`ia oo i le Aso Gafua AAFIAGA...Maualuluga galu, malosi le aave o le sami, ma le aafia o matafaga. FAUTUAGA/TAPENAGA... O fautuaga mo galu maualuluga e faailoa mai ai le malolosi ma le tetele o galu o le a aafia ai gataifale ma matafaga, ma o le a malolosi aave o le sami e ono solo ai nisi o vaega o le matafaga. Ona o le siisii o peau o le sami, e fautuaina ai le mamalu lautele ma le au fai faiva ina ia faautagia mai lenei fautuaga ona o le maualuluga o galu ua iai nei.

area.areaDesc: Manua; Rose Atoll; Swains Island; Tutuila and Aunuu
